column5: I took a buddies son out today from 11am til 3 pm & he got his 1st Pike ever & then some, as well as I met another buddies Son & his Girl friend & every one caught fish, Jenna's biggest Pike 28" & my Biggest Smbass today was 21.75" & 5.5 lbs caught on a flippin jig , we headed for cover while a 40 minute lightning storm rolled by Richard

nice smallie...  the young guy musta had fun with those pike.  We were fishing a short ways from you and missed the rain and the lightning... could here it in the distance though... got caught in it real bad on the way home... had to slow down to 30 k on the highway with the 4-way's on.
nice smallie  always great to take kids out fishing
Looks like a great day was had by all!!!  You should really sign up for a photobucket account so you can post nice size pics!
That is a very nice bass.  Such a great feeling taking kids out and getting them on to fish, good for you.
Great report and pics Richard It's always fun to watch someone catch his first!!!  Congratulations and thanks for sharing Leechman
Woo nice smallmouth bass man, nice pike's also. Nothing better than fishing in the rain...cept for taking pictures,  Thanks for Sharing, MTBF
great report!  Nice big smallie you got into!!!  Cheers!
